案例.definition: case (of fraud, hepatitis, international cooperation etc); instance; example; CL:個|个[ge4]

案兵束甲.definition: to rest weapons and loosen armor (idiom); to relax from fighting

案子.definition: long table; counter; (coll.) case (criminal, medical etc); matter; project; job

案由.definition: main points of a case; brief; summary

案甲休兵.definition: to put down weapon and let soldiers rest (idiom); to relax from fighting

案發.definition: (of a crime) to occur; (old) (of a crime) to be discovered; to investigate a crime on the spot

案語.definition: variant of 按語|按语[an4 yu3]

案首.definition: candidate who ranked 1st in imperial examination on prefecture or county level (in Ming and Qing dynasties)

案驗.definition: (old) to investigate the evidence of a case
